Contact Class Reference

Documentation

This class holds a contact_t object and allows accessing that data.

The data can be stored as an EON file by using save() which stores the data at /home/data/contacts/callsign.eon. Data is stored in the EON form as

{ type: "contact", data: binary contact_t }

When converting to JSON, this format is used:

{ "type": "ContactJSON", "data": { "domain": string, "callsign": string, "sn": string } }

Definition at line 38 of file Contact.hpp.
